{{ 'newsAndEvent' | translate }}

{{ item.title }}

{{ item.titleEN }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { TranslateService } from '@ngx-translate/core'; import { ServiceProvider } from 'src/app/shared/service-provider.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-news', templateUrl: './news.component.html', styleUrls: ['./news.component.scss'] }) export class NewsComponent implements OnInit { newsList: any[] = []; constructor(private serviceProvider: ServiceProvider, public translate: TranslateService) { } ngOnInit(): void { const url = 'm/news/read'; const body = { skip: 0, limit: 5, permission: "20250617105043-193-133", keySearch: "", center: null, imageUrlCreateBy: "https://khubdeedlt.we-builds.com/khubdeedlt-document/images/personal/personal_250438651.png", updateBy: "admincms", lv0: "", lv1: "", lv2: "", lv3: "", lv4: "", organization: [ { title: "super admin", lv0: "", lv1: "", lv2: "", lv3: "", lv4: "", lv5: "", status: "A" } ] }; this.serviceProvider.post(url, body).subscribe((data) => { var model: any = {} model = data; this.newsList = model.objectData }); } }
